title: Aceh Bible - Gospel of John (print)
description: The Alkitab Aceh is a Bible translated by the Indonesian Bible Society into the the Aceh or Acehnese language in 1997. Acehnese is one of the dialects in the Austronesian language family, spoken in the coastal areas of the northern tip of Sumatra.

language.name: Achinese
language.area: Aceh Province (north tip of Sumatra), coastal areas.
